General.Name: Vaswani Industries Limited
General.Description: Vaswani Industries Limited engages in manufacture and trading of iron ore pellets, sponge iron, steel billets, HB wires, and ingots in India. The company operates through four segments: Iron & Steel, Power, Real Estate, and Agri Division. It also generates power through waste heat recovery boilers with an installed capacity of 11.5 megawatts. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Raipur, India.
